TopicTitle: l Bugs Aero l SF-17 Kurfurst

Articles.Content:
Hello KSP forum, today I will be showcasing my latest project and will possibly release it.

Specifications:

Parts: 83

Mass:11.3t

Speed at Altitudes

330 m/s @ 100m

(Stays 330m/s up until around 8000m)

650 m/s @ 10000m

(Can last up to 750 m/s but will burn up)

In .90 this plane was preforming well, but in this new update, I honestly thought this plane would be useless. Turns out I was completely wrong. This plane preforms amazingly well and has a lot of control under low speeds. My current mission with this plane is to make this plane preform the Pugachev's Cobra.
